root.title: Black Clover
root.author: Tabata Yuuki
root.synopsis: In a world where magic was everything, there was a boy born unable to use any magic, and he had been abandoned to a poor church as a child. His name was Asta. To prove oneself and to keep his promise with his friend, he aims to become the Wizard King! An all-time favorite young and magical fantasy drawn with a beautiful touch and moved by its passionate characters!
